positive_examples: This is an example of parallel postulate.
The parallel postulate demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed parallel postulate in this context.
A typical case of parallel postulate would involve these features.
The concept of parallel postulate applies here.
The geometric axiom that determines whether a geometry is Euclidean or non-Euclidean based on parallel line behavior.
negative_examples: This is an example of superposition principle, not parallel postulate.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SuperpositionPrinciple, or other types of Axiom

definition: The geometric axiom stating that through a point not on a line, exactly one parallel line exists.
